title: "Building” means a structure, constructed with any materials whatsoever for any purpose, whether use
clause_text: "Building” means a structure, constructed with any materials whatsoever for any purpose, whether used for human habitation or not, and includes- Foundation, plinth, walls, floors, roofs, chimneys, plumbing and building services, fixed platforms; any wall enclosing or intended to enclose any land or space, signs and outdoor display structures; tanks constructed for storage of chemicals or chemicals in liquid form;
